law.catch_line: Department of Vehicle Regulation's authority to perform commission's duties upon failure or inability to perform.
law.text: If the commission fails to perform or is unable to perform any of its official duties within the time prescribed in this chapter, the department may perform these duties.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 452, sec. 9, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 374, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 10.
